content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** **materials ** * japanese size 8/0 crochet hook 5 0mm * 15g 18 7m color a * 15g 18 7m color b no gauge is given in the pattern original suggested yarn is discontinued zakka acrylic is suggested instead **notes ** the line under each single_crochet x means to single_crochet into the *back loop only* 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/23-44/
